column1: Little Goat Diner////This Little Piggy Went To China - this is an absolute must order! My absolute favorite dish
column2: the cheddar biscuits are like those from Red Lobster
column3: but topped with eggs and pork sausage. It's topped off with a splendid sauce that you will be licking off your plate! Even the blackberries seem right at home on this plate
